item.title: 泰国计划制定新的大麻规则以抑制药房繁荣

item.title: 英伟达 4 万亿美元股价涨势面临前所未有的威胁
item.description: 随着 2026 年的到来，这家世界上最有价值的公司在股市上的地位摇摇欲坠。【原文：The world’s most valuable company is on shaky stock market footing as 2026 gets underway.】

item.title: 美国银行认为阿迪达斯增长放缓，阿迪达斯遭罕见抛售
item.description: 阿迪达斯公司周二股价下滑，美国银行罕见地给予该股卖出评级，称这家德国运动鞋制造商的处境将更加艰难。【原文：Adidas AG shares slid on Tuesday as Bank of America Corp. gave the stock a rare sell rating, saying things are about to get tougher for the German sneaker maker.】

item.title: 丹麦中央银行警告格陵兰岛财政状况突然恶化
item.description: 丹麦中央银行在一份关于这个再次引发地缘政治紧张局势的北极岛屿的分析报告中说，格陵兰的公共财政在去年 "出人意料地急剧恶化 "后面临压力。【原文：Greenland’s public finances are pressured after a “surprisingly sharp deterioration” last year, Denmark’s central bank said in an analysis of the Arctic island that’s again stoking geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 以色列寻求在战后首次欧洲债券销售中筹资数十亿美元
item.description: 以色列正在出售一笔多期欧洲债券，这是自加沙停火近三个月以来以色列首次向全球投资者发出呼吁。【原文：Israel is selling a multi-tranche Eurobond, its first appeal to global investors since the ceasefire in Gaza almost three months ago.】

item.title: 交易员没有表现出对委内瑞拉的担忧，但各种事件预示着 2026 年的风险
item.description: 要想在 2026 年实现连续第四年两位数的回报率，华尔街的多头们需要做很多正确的事情。美国与邻国之间的贸易关系依然紧张。美国经济出现疲软迹象，利率即使在三次降息后仍居高不下，人工智能贸易也远未实现大满贯。【原文：Wall Street bulls need a lot to go right if 2026 is going to deliver a fourth straight year of double-digit returns. Trade tensions between the US and its neighbors remain high. The US economy is showing signs of sluggishness, interest rates are elevated even after three cuts and the artificial intelligence trade is far from a slam dunk.】

item.title: 默茨称德国部分地区经济状况 "非常危急
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希-梅尔茨在致立法者的一封信中称，德国经济的 "某些部门 "处于 "非常危急 "的状态，并补充说，恢复增长将是德国政府今年的首要任务。【原文：German Chancellor Friedrich Merz described “certain sectors” of his country’s economy as being in “very critical” condition in a letter to lawmakers, adding that reviving growth will be his government’s top priority this year.】

item.title: 马杜罗下台后，金矿商旨在夺回委内瑞拉资产
item.description: 黄金储备有限公司（Gold Reserve Ltd. ）多年来一直在与尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolas Maduro）政府争夺被委内瑞拉没收的两处黄金矿藏。现在，在美国于周六抓获该国领导人之后，这家小矿业公司看到了重新获得这些珍贵资产的道路。【原文：Gold Reserve Ltd. has spent years fighting with Nicolas Maduro’s government over two gold deposits seized by Venezuela. Now, after the US captured the country’s leader on Saturday, the tiny mining company sees a path to regain those prized assets.】

item.title: 克莱尔百货进入英国破产程序，莫德拉将高街之痛归咎于此
item.description: 英国和爱尔兰的 Claire's Accessories 与折扣百货连锁店 The Original Factory Shop 一起进入破产程序，因为所有者 Modella Capital 未能扭转零售商陷入困境的局面。【原文：Claire’s Accessories in the UK and Ireland entered insolvency proceedings along with discount department store chain The Original Factory Shop, after owner Modella Capital failed to turn around the struggling retailers.】

item.title: 英国采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，英国出口在经历长达一年的低迷后恢复增长
item.description: 一项调查显示，英国企业的海外订单在一年多以来首次回升，这表明私营部门的活动在 2025 年底出现了转机。【原文：British businesses reported their first pickup in overseas orders in over a year, according to a survey suggesting private sector activity turned a corner at the end of 2025.】

item.title: 欧洲央行维勒鲁瓦称攻击美联储独立性会损害美元
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，美国政府对美联储的批评威胁到美元在全球经济中的作用。【原文：The US administration’s criticism of the Federal Reserve threatens the US dollar’s role in the global economy, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 日本股市迎来 1990 年以来最强劲的开局
item.description: 受海外投资者和个人强劲买盘的推动，日本股市创下几十年来最强劲的开局。【原文：Japanese stocks made their strongest start in several decades, buoyed by robust buying from overseas investors and individuals.】

item.title: 日本贸易商呼吁稳定日元以保护投资
item.description: 日本一些最大的贸易公司警告说，日元近期的波动正在增加投资风险，并敦促当局帮助稳定货币。【原文：Some of Japan’s biggest trading houses warned that the recent volatility in the yen is boosting investment risks, and urged authorities to help stabilize the currency.】

item.title: 韩国总统李明博寻求 "全面恢复 "与中国的关系
item.description: 在首尔寻求 "全面恢复 "双边关系之际，韩国总统李在明会见了中国总理李强，并在会谈中承诺深化合作，这与他与习近平主席的峰会遥相呼应。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung met with Chinese Premier Li Qiang and pledged deeper cooperation in talks that echoed his summit with President Xi Jinping as Seoul seeks a “full restoration” of bilateral ties.】

item.title: 中国因台湾言论对日本军方实施出口管制
item.description: 中国对出口到日本的可能具有军事用途的产品实施管制，这加剧了亚洲头号经济体之间因日本首相佐那江隆一去年有关台湾的言论而引发的争端。【原文：China imposed controls on exports to Japan that could have military use, intensifying a dispute between Asia’s top economies over remarks Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi made last year on Taiwan.】

item.title: 黎巴嫩称中央银行有足够实力支持经济复苏计划
item.description: 黎巴嫩经济部长表示，中央银行有能力支持一项计划，偿还大部分存款人多年来被困在金融系统中的资金。【原文：Lebanon’s economy minister said the central bank has the ability to back a plan to repay most depositors whose funds have been trapped in the financial system for years.】

item.title: 零售业忧虑重重，Reliance 迎来 2024 年以来最差一天
item.description: 穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）控制的企业集团是零售业的主要参与者，在分析师警告零售业竞争加剧后，信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）股价暴跌。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd.’s shares tumbled after analysts warned of rising competition in the retail sector, where the Mukesh Ambani-controlled conglomerate is a major player.】

item.title: InPost 收到收购公司的指示性建议书

item.title: 亚洲股市创历年最佳开局，货币走强
item.description: 随着投资者在美国以外地区寻找机会，亚洲股市迎来了有史以来最好的开局，该地区的货币和债券也随之反弹。【原文：Asian stocks are having their best-ever start to a year, with the region’s currencies and bonds also rallying as investors seek opportunities outside the US.】

item.title: 法国能源通胀降至七个月低点
item.description: 由于能源成本下降，法国的通胀率在 12 月份略有放缓，这表明欧洲央行得以维持利率不变的背景几乎没有改变。【原文：French inflation slowed slightly in December as energy costs fell, indicating little change in the backdrop that has allowed the European Central Bank to keep interest rates on hold.】

item.title: 保险公司保诚宣布 12 亿美元股票回购计划
item.description: 保诚集团（Prudential Plc）将开始回购 12 亿美元的股票，因为该公司希望在 12 月份将印度分公司上市后，将多余的资金返还给投资者。【原文：Prudential Plc will start a $1.2 billion share buyback, as the company looks to return excess capital to investors after listing an Indian unit in December.】

item.title: 因假日销售强劲，Next 再次上调盈利预测

item.title: 未来资产印度分公司资深员工马亨德拉-贾朱加盟 Quant Mutual Fund

item.title: 中国避开委内瑞拉石油，因为报价越来越贵

item.title: 中东石油市场疲软加剧全球疲软迹象
item.description: 中东原油市场进一步显示出疲软迹象，加剧了人们对全球原油供应过剩可能拖累油价下跌的担忧，同时也使亚洲交易商得以摆脱委内瑞拉的事态发展。【原文：The Middle Eastern crude market is showing further signs of weakness, amplifying concerns about a global glut that could drag prices lower, while enabling Asian traders to shrug off developments in Venezuela.】
